body.name: Mini Printer Sticker Maker - T02 Thermal Printer, Bluetooth Wireless Portable Phone Printer, Small Instant Pocket Printer, for Anatomy Picture, Children DIY, Pink
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 23 hrs 7 mins
features: 【How to Use】: Only print black and white. Connect Memoking T02 rechargeable pocket printer to your iOS or Android devices via Bluetooth in APP by clicking “unconnected” in the right up corner of the APP page after selecting T02 model in left up corner, then choose any functions to start your black and white pictures wireless printing journey (Find our user guide video in product page. Or in APP: Profile→Use Tutorial).

【What Functions Provided in APP】: APP is for free forever for users. 9 powerful functions for super easy unique customization. Combining text, pictures, tables, emojis and QR code freely to make unique sticker pictures. Hundreds of free templates and graphics provided in APP. “OCR” and “Scan” make it possible to transfer an objects or words in daily life into digital editable version. Moreover, micro letters, banners, online web printing are achievable in APP.

【Use Occasions】:Memoking T02 203dpi wireless small printer is suitable for printing black and white photos, memos, records, plenty of APP themes in your home, school and office for students, children, teachers, handwork teaching, work plans, shopping lists, “TO DO” lists and so on. For Christmas gift.

【Types of Thermal Papers Supported】:Memoking T02 pocket printer works with sticky and non-sticky thermal papers with black printouts on white/pure color/patterns paper and blue printouts on special white paper.

【Important Precaution】: ①Please connect Bluetooth from APP. ②No paper alert: although there are papers in the machine, it still shows “not paper”. Solution: take the paper roll out, then long press the power button for 10 seconds until you see green light flashes 2 times. After that, put that paper into the machine again to print normally. ③The printed content is easy to shift without the paper holder. ④Find the holder installation video in product page if you have any problems on it.
body.description: Tips for Better Printing Charge the machine regularly. When the power is low, the printouts will be blurred.Moisten a cotton swab with alcohol, and gently wipe the print head regularly to clean dust.Select high-pixel photos to print instead of blurred pictures.Reduce the noise of pictures before printing for better effects. 1 white non-sticky paper roll comes with the printer. Printing Method: Direct Thermal Printing (no ink, no toner) Size: 3.4”x3.5”x1.6”/87x90x40mm Weight: 5.3oz/150g Color: Pink/Green/White Power: 1000 Charge Way: USB Compatible System: iOS & Android

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Easy to Use - Only 4 Steps Needed Turn on the Memoking Photo Printer Install a T02 Thermal Paper Roll Put the Holder with Paper Back to the Machine Connect Bluetooth in "Phomemo" APP
Multifunctional Free "Phomemo" Operation APP - Make Your Creation Simpler and More Interesting 10 Powerful Functions for Unique Black and White Printouts Attention: Only print in black and white.

Ideal Gift Choice for a Variety of People For Children Suitable for children to develop intelligence, cultivate creativity, and parent-child activities. For Families Record every warm moment with the family anytime and anywhere. For Girlfriends The T02 printer is not only cute in appearance, but also versatile in functions. For Craft Lovers You will definitely fall in love with the powerful functions and simple operation of T02 machine.

Usage Notice Please connect Bluetooth from “Phomemo” APP. No paper alert: take the paper roll out, then long press the power button for 10 seconds until you see green light flashes 2 times. After that, put that paper into the machine again to print normally. The printed content is easy to shift without the paper holder. Tips for Better Printing Charge the machine regularly. When the power is low, the printouts will be blurred.Moisten a cotton swab with alcohol, and gently wipe the print head regularly to clean dust.Select high-pixel photos to print instead of blurred pictures.Reduce the noise of pictures before printing for better effects. 1 white non-sticky paper roll comes with the printer. Printing Method: Direct Thermal Printing (no ink, no toner) Size: 3.4”x3.5”x1.6”/87x90x40mm Weight: 5.3oz/150g Color: Pink/Green/White Power: 1000 Charge Way: USB Compatible System: iOS & Android

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not bad at all!
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE 1/9: The printer is suddenly shutting off when I go to print some photos, and does not appear to be charging when I plug it in.Original Revew:This came up on sale, and photography is a hobby of mine, so the instant printing aspect of printing for journaling and art has always appealed to me, and I just said “why not?” If it sucks it gets returned, I give it a crap review, and move on with life.Well, VERY surprisingly, it was easy to set up and use and the results are pretty good! It’s not what the photoshopping on the ads for this product show, but I was not expecting a “photo quality” product.I DO however wish that there was more sticker paper, and the colored paper (it comes with green, white and purple sticker paper) was optional, not standard.Other than that, it’s a pretty cool little toy, and good for decorating stuff, and journaling!HOWEVER: I have only had this for a short time, so if there are any issues, they haven’t popped up yet. The printer itself feels sort of chintzy and it warns about leaving it plugged in too long for overheating? (Yikes?) If I have issues down the line I will update.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The pictures aren’t really clear. But it’s fun to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This mini printer is perfect and compact. It has the ability to be brought with you anywhere wether it’s in your backpack or in your dorm. It is great quality and certainly worth the price point. It is quiet and can print anything. It’s versatility is amazing and it is so useful for school notes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect little printer
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my granddaughter who loves stickers. She loved that it was small enough to carry in her backpack and that it doesn’t need ink to print. She can customize and print her own pictures or notes but also can choose to use their suggestions. The notes print in black and white. She is quite the artist and is loving that she can colorize these herself. The printer is so easy to use and she enjoyed being able to use right out of the box. I enjoyed that the seller is so easy to do business with and has great communication through the buying process. All in all great experience and super great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Memoking Mini Portable Sticker Printer T02: A Disappointing Experience
reviews.reviewText: Regrettably, my experience with the Memoking Mini Portable Sticker Printer T02, bundled with 3 rolls of paper, has left me with strong reservations. In all honesty, it's challenging to find redeeming qualities, and I express these sentiments not to discredit the product but to share my genuine disappointment.The first caveat comes with the understanding that this is an affordable product, and expectations should be tempered accordingly. However, the printing quality is subpar, to say the least. It's reminiscent of sketches drawn with a toe – blurry, undefined, and lacking the clarity one would expect from a sticker printer.Furthermore, the darkness of the prints adds another layer of frustration. The images come out so dark that discerning finer details becomes an arduous task. This not only detracts from the visual appeal but also renders the prints less useful, defeating the purpose of a sticker printer.The choice of film for the stickers is another letdown. It resembles receipt paper, thin and lacking the adhesive quality one anticipates in stickers. The lack of proper adhesive makes the stickers prone to peeling off, significantly diminishing their practicality.While one might argue that you get what you pay for, it's essential to note that even within the realm of budget-friendly products, a baseline level of functionality is expected. The Memoking Mini Portable Sticker Printer T02 falls short of meeting these expectations, and its drawbacks significantly impact its utility.In conclusion, my candid assessment of the Memoking Mini Portable Sticker Printer T02 is one of disappointment. The printing quality, darkness of prints, and the thin, non-adhesive nature of the sticker paper collectively contribute to an unsatisfactory user experience. For those seeking a reliable and functional portable sticker printer, exploring alternative options might be a more prudent choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Saw this item on Instagram and thought I would purchase it for my son who is in college. Nice design, fits in your hand, portable, easy and clear printing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars White paper doesn’t stick
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the 3 pack of paper and the white paper they sent doesn’t stick but the colored paper does. That is disappointing bc I would mostly use the white. The printer is cute and does a decent job for easy little jobs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little printer
reviews.reviewText: When I first got this, it worked great. The kids loved it and thought it was a lot of fun. Picked it up today and it wouldn't work. Tried resetting it but still wouldn't work. Hooked it to my iPad and it was fine. So I Uninstalled the app on my phone and reinstalled it, now it works great. Something to consider if anyone else has trouble.

So easy to use. Very cute idea and great for kids. Prints cute little stickers that my little girl journals with. Takes pictures of her friends. Was able to print pictures of her as a baby from my phone. Great idea. Would buy again and have recommended to others
Solo que esperaba la etiqueta trasnparente como decía en la referencia pero si e muy buena comora

Le bouton pour l'allumer et pour l'éteindre est resté enfoncé pratiquement 2 jours après l'avoir reçue. Impossible de la connecter avec mon portable depuis ni d'imprimer le code QR car le bouton est défectueux. En faite, elle est tombée en panne très rapidement. C'est très décevant.
Preciosa, pequeña, cómoda de usar, impresiones de calidad
